content.rendered:
BUSINESS FUNDING

No Broker Fees – Quick Turnaround – Straightforward Requirements

Our products are purchases of account receivables and not business loans.

APPLY NOW

WE SUPPORT BUSINESS GROWTH

And we know how critical business funding is to your success

EASY TO APPLY FUNDING

* UP TO $25,000,000

SUBMIT APPLICATION & BANK STATEMENTS
REVIEW AND ACCEPT OFFER
SUBMIT BUSINESS DOCUMENTS
GET FUNDED
GET STARTED
100% TRANSPARENCY

E&E FUNDING GROUP takes transparency very seriously and will provide you with direct answers to any questions you may have.

EASY TO QUALIFY

We don’t look at your credit score alone, we consider more comprehensive aspects of your business which reflect on the health of your operations.

PROMPT FUNDING

E&E FUNDING GROUP prides itself in providing capital for your business needs as quickly as possible. Qualified applicants can receive funding within a few hours.

WE BACK BUSINESSES FUNDING

Get approval in a matter of hours and see the money in your account as fast as one day later.

TRUSTED BY
BUSINESS OWNERS
SINCE 2015
SMALL BUSINESS
FUNDING OPTIONS

UP TO $25,000,000

 

WE OFFER FUNDING SOLUTIONS FOR MOST BUSINESS TYPES

Medical Business Funding

Our medical business funding team specializes in providing funding solutions to a variety of businesses in the medical field.

Health and Wellness

From home health care to gyms and beauty spas we help you with your current funding needs.

Auto Repair Funding

Repair Shops, Tire Shops, Auto Body Shops, Towing Companies we have funded all of them. Read more here about.

Manufacturing Funding

We believe in Made in America. A larger facility, more or better equipment, payroll, and inventory are just a few examples of why manufacturers turn to us.

Restaurant Funding

Payroll, equipment, marketing, renovation, remodeling, or emergency repairs are just a few reasons why restaurant owners turn to us.

Retail Business Funding

Retailers turn to us for funding inventory, marketing, payroll, remodeling, and expansion.

HOW BUSINESS FUNDING BY E&E FUNDING GROUP
WORKS

-NO FIXED PAYMENTS - PAY AS YOU GO!

There are never any fixed payments with us, we collect an agreed-upon percentage of your sales, so if your sales drop so do the payments. We can reconcile payments based on sales daily, weekly, or monthly.

-WHO CAN I CONTACT WITH ANY QUESTIONS?

Call us! anytime, Our funding specialists are waiting to help you.

-IS MY INFORMATION SECURE?

Yes, we take protecting your information seriously. Please see our Privacy Policy.

-WHAT DOCUMENTS ARE REQUIRED FOR BUSINESS FUNDING?

To get started, Apply Here. Then we will request a few documents to demonstrate the performance of your business and your last 4 months of Business Bank Statements. That’s it.

-HOW WILL -MY CREDIT IMPACT MY APPLICATION?

Here at E&$ Funding Group we don’t let Credit tell the whole story. We want to understand you credit history and learn about your business as a whole.

-HOW SOON WILL I HAVE ACCESS TO FUNDS?

Once you’ve completed the funding process, you can have access to funds within 24 hours, sometimes even sooner!

-HOW IS BUSINESS FUNDING REPAYMENT MADE?

We offer repayments via ACH from your Business Bank Account or via Credit Cards. You deliver the specified percentage of receivables on a daily basis.

-ARE YOU A DIRECT FUNDER?

Yes! We are a Direct Funding source.

-WHAT IF I DON'T QUALIFY FOR FUNDING?

You’ll never know until you fill in your profile. If you are one of the few we can’t help then we’ll tell you straight away and let you know how you can improve.

-WHAT CAN I USE THE FUNDS FOR?

Funding must be used for business purposes, and you are in control of determining how to best use the capital for your business. Some examples are: Payroll, Remodeling,Inventory, Working Capital, Expansion Marketing Equipment

RECONCILIATIONS, HERE'S HOW IT WORKS

We reconcile your sales to ensure you are remitting payments that are reflective of your actual sales and not more.

WE REVIEW YOUR SALES DEPOSITS
WE CALCULATE WHAT THE REMITTANCE AMOUNT IS
YOU GET NOTIFICATIONS WITH OUR RECONCILIATION RESULT
PAYMENT IS DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT THE NEXT DAY
